alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Stephenson; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 24 at 10:26PM CDT until June 24 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN WHITESIDE...EASTERN CARROLL AND STEPHENSON COUNTIES... At 1025 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Dakota Dornink Airport to near Shannon to near Milledgeville to Ustick, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Freeport, Sterling, Rock Falls, Morrison, Fulton, Lanark, Milledgeville, Fairhaven, Shannon, Cedarville, Davis, Chadwick, Dakota, German Valley, Rock City, Coleta, Ridott, Emerson, Argo Fay and Buena Vista. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in the Quad Cities. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
